mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.user_name, u.user_id, u.user_pw, u.user_before_pw, u.user_birth, u.user_phone, u.user_email, u.user_reg_date, u.user_upd_date, u.user_gender, u.enabled, c.com_no, c.com_name, c.com_category, c.com_address, c.com_business, a.auth_no, a.auth FROM user u LEFT JOIN company c ON u.user_no = c.user_no LEFT JOIN user_auth a ON u.user_no = a.user_no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_no , u.user_name , u.user_id , u.user_pw , u.user_before_pw , u.user_birth , u.user_phone , u.user_email , u.user_reg_date , u.user_upd_date , u.user_gender , u.enabled , a.auth_no , a.auth FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_auth a ON u.user_no = a.user_no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( user_name, user_id, user_pw, user_birth, user_phone, user_email, user_gender ) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender})
INSERT INTO company( user_no,com_name, com_category, com_address, com_business ) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{comName}, #{comCategory}, #{comAddress}, #{comBusiness})
INSERT INTO user_auth( user_no, auth ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{auth} )
INSERT INTO user_social ( id, username, provider, social_id, name, email, picture ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{username}, #{provider}, #{socialId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{picture} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no ,u.user_id ,u.user_pw ,u.user_name ,u.user_email -- ,u.profile -- 이 컬럼은 테이블에 존재하지 않음 ,u.ENABLED ,u.user_reg_date ,u.user_upd_date ,auth.auth FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN user_auth auth ON u.user_no = auth.user_no WHERE u.user_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM user_social WHERE provider = #{provider} AND social_id = #{socialId} );
